title: Freedom of the press
creator_credit: Alexander Hammid, Irving Jacoby and Affiliated Film Producers
brief_description: An historical review of freedom of the press in America from Zenger’s weekly journal to the publication of today’s newspapers. The film covers one news story (President Truman’s tax proposal) to metropolitan, small town and rural newspapers. Differentiates between news reporting and editorialising.
